text: The Love Bug (also known as Herbie the Love Bug) is a 1968 American sports adventure comedy movie directed by Robert Stevenson from a screenplay by Bill Walsh and Don DaGradi, based on the story "Car, Boy, Girl" by Gordon Buford. The movie is the first installment in the Herbie movie series. Category:1968 adventure movies Category:1968 comedy movies Category:1960s sports movies Category:English-language movies Category:Herbie movies Category:Movies directed by Robert Stevenson
title: The Love Bug
